## üìÑ src/store/index.js (–±–µ–∑ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–π, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ)

```javascript
import { configureStore } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'
import ordersReducer from './reducers/ordersReducer'
import currencyReducer from './reducers/currencyReducer'

export const store = configureStore({
  reducer: {
    orders: ordersReducer,
    currency: currencyReducer
  }
})

export default store
```

## üìÑ src/store/reducers/ordersReducer.js (–±–µ–∑ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–π, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ)

```javascript
const initialState = {
  orders: [],
  order: null,
  loading: false,
  error: null
};

export default function ordersReducer(state = initialState, action) {
  switch (action.type) {
    case 'FETCH_ORDERS_REQUEST':
    case 'FETCH_ORDER_REQUEST':
      return {
        ...state,
        loading: true,
        error: null
      };
      
    case 'FETCH_ORDERS_SUCCESS':
      return {
        ...state,
        loading: false,
        orders: action.payload
      };
      
    case 'FETCH_ORDER_SUCCESS':
      return {
        ...state,
        loading: false,
        order: action.payload
      };
      
    case 'FETCH_ORDERS_FAILURE':
    case 'FETCH_ORDER_FAILURE':
      return {
        ...state,
        loading: false,
        error: action.payload
      };
      
    default:
      return state;
  }
}
```

---

## üìÑ src/store/reducers/currencyReducer.js (–±–µ–∑ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–π, —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ)

```javascript
const initialState = {
  rates: null,
  lastUpdate: null,
  updateStatus: 'idle', // 'idle', 'loading', 'succeeded', 'failed'
  error: null,
  lastManualUpdate: null
};

export default function currencyReducer(state = initialState, action) {
  switch (action.type) {
    case 'CURRENCY_RATES_LOADING':
      return {
        ...state,
        updateStatus: 'loading',
        error: null
      };
      
    case 'CURRENCY_RATES_SUCCEEDED':
      return {
        ...state,
        rates: action.payload.rates,
        lastUpdate: action.payload.lastUpdate,
        updateStatus: 'succeeded',
        error: null,
        lastManualUpdate: action.payload.isManual ? new Date().toISOString() : state.lastManualUpdate
      };
      
    case 'CURRENCY_RATES_FAILED':
      return {
        ...state,
        updateStatus: 'failed',
        error: action.payload
      };
      
    default:
      return state;
  }
}
```

**–¢—ã –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—à—å JSX-—Å–∏–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Å–∏—Å –≤ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–µ —Å —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º `.js`**, –∞ Vite —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Ñ–∞–π–ª—ã —Å JSX –∏–º–µ–ª–∏ —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ `.jsx`.

## üõ†Ô∏è –ö–∞–∫ –∏—Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å (–ø–æ—à–∞–≥–æ–≤–æ):

### –®–∞–≥ 1: –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∏–º–µ–Ω—É–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª—ã —Å JSX
1. –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∏–º–µ–Ω—É–π **src/App.js** ‚Üí **src/App.jsx**
2. –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∏–º–µ–Ω—É–π **src/main.jsx** ‚Üí **src/main.jsx** (—É–∂–µ –∏–º–µ–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ)
3. –ü–µ—Ä–µ–∏–º–µ–Ω—É–π –≤—Å–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç—ã —Å `.js` –Ω–∞ `.jsx`:
   - –í—Å–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª—ã –≤ –ø–∞–ø–∫–∞—Ö `components/`, `services/`, `store/` —Å —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º `.js` ‚Üí `.jsx`

### –®–∞–≥ 2: –û–±–Ω–æ–≤–∏ –∏–º–ø–æ—Ä—Ç—ã
–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∏–º–µ–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤, –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–∏ –≤—Å–µ –∏–º–ø–æ—Ä—Ç—ã –≤ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ:

**–ë–´–õ–û:**
```javascript

```

**–°–¢–ê–õ–û:**

–¢–µ–ø–µ—Ä—å –≤—Å–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª—ã —Å JSX –≤ —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–∏ `.js` –±—É–¥—É—Ç –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –±–µ–∑ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫! üòä

### USER
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'
import Header from './components/layout/Header'
import Sidebar from './components/layout/Sidebar'
import OrdersList from './components/orders/OrdersList'
import OrderDetails from './components/orders/OrderDetails'
import Messages from './components/messages/Messages'
import Shipments from './components/shipments/Shipments'
import Documents from './components/documents/Documents'
import Clients from './components/clients/Clients'
import Suppliers from './components/suppliers/Suppliers'
import Settings from './components/settings/Settings'
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'

function App() {
  const location = useLocation()
  const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false)
  
  // –ó–∞–∫—Ä—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –º–µ–Ω—é –ø—Ä–∏ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∞
  useEffect(() => {
    setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)
  }, [location])
  
  return (
    <Router>
      <div className="flex h-screen bg-gray-50 text-gray-900 overflow-hidden">
        {/* –ú–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –º–µ–Ω—é */}
        {isMobileMenuOpen && (
          <>
            <div 
              className="sidebar-overlay"
              onClick={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)}
            />
            <div className="mobile-sidebar">
              <Sidebar isMobile={true} onClose={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} />
            </div>
          </>
        )}
        
        {/* –°–∞–π–¥–±–∞—Ä –¥–ª—è –¥–µ—Å–∫—Ç–æ–ø–∞ */}
        <div className="hidden md:block">
          <Sidebar />
        </div>
        
        <div className="flex-1 flex flex-col overflow-hidden">
          <Header 
            onMobileMenuToggle={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen)} 
            isMobileMenuOpen={isMobileMenuOpen}
          />
          
          <main className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto bg-gray-50">
            <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-6">
              <Routes>
                <Route path="/" element={<OrdersList />} />
                <Route path="/orders/:id" element={<OrderDetails />} />
                <Route path="/messages" element={<Messages />} />
                <Route path="/shipments" element={<Shipments />} />
                <Route path="/documents" element={<Documents />} />
                <Route path="/clients" element={<Clients />} />
                <Route path="/suppliers" element={<Suppliers />} />
                <Route path="/settings" element={<Settings />} />
              </Routes>
            </div>
          </main>
        </div>
      </div>
    </Router>
  )
}

export default App

## üí° –°—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–µ —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è

### 1. –û—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–µ–Ω–∏–µ Qwen –¥–ª—è VS Code

## üß± –ü–û–î–†–û–ë–ù–´–ï –ò–ù–°–¢–†–£–ö–¶–ò–ò –î–õ–Ø CODEx AI

### 1. –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –ë–ê–ó–´ –î–ê–ù–ù–´–•

**–§–∞–π–ª**: backend/database/__init__.py

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—é `get_db()` –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫ –±–∞–∑–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—é `init_db()` –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∏ –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è. –ë–∞–∑–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω–∞ –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ `backend/database/cargo_manager.db`.

**–í–ê–ñ–ù–û**: –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Ñ–∞–π–ª –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–µ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç, –≤—ã–∑–æ–≤–∏ –∏—Å–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç–Ω—ã–º —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º.

**SQL-–∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –¥–ª—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ç–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü**:

```sql
-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç
CREATE TABLE Currencies (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    code TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
    is_purchase_base BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    is_reporting_base BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- –ó–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç—ã
INSERT INTO Currencies (code, name, symbol, is_purchase_base, is_reporting_base) VALUES
('CNY', '–ö–∏—Ç–∞–π—Å–∫–∏–π —é–∞–Ω—å', '¬•', 1, 0),
('RUB', '–†–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π —Ä—É–±–ª—å', '‚ÇΩ', 0, 1),
('USD', '–î–æ–ª–ª–∞—Ä –°–®–ê', '$', 0, 0);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç
CREATE TABLE CurrencyRates (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    base_currency_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    target_currency_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    rate REAL NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    source TEXT NOT NULL,
    UNIQUE(base_currency_id, target_currency_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(base_currency_id) REFERENCES Currencies(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(target_currency_id) REFERENCES Currencies(id)
);

-- –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—ã –¥–ª—è —É—Å–∫–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è
CREATE INDEX idx_currency_rates_base ON CurrencyRates(base_currency_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_currency_rates_target ON CurrencyRates(target_currency_id);

-- –ó–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º –±–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã
INSERT INTO CurrencyRates (base_currency_id, target_currency_id, rate, source)
SELECT 
    c1.id, c2.id, 
    CASE 
        WHEN c1.code = 'CNY' AND c2.code = 'RUB' THEN 12.60
        WHEN c1.code = 'CNY' AND c2.code = 'USD' THEN 0.14
        WHEN c1.code = 'USD' AND c2.code = 'RUB' THEN 92.50
        ELSE 1.0 
    END,
    '–¶–ë –†–§'
FROM Currencies c1, Currencies c2
WHERE 
    (c1.code = 'CNY' AND c2.code IN ('RUB', 'USD')) OR
    (c1.code = 'USD' AND c2.code = 'RUB');

-- –¢—Ä–∏–≥–≥–µ—Ä –¥–ª—è –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏
CREATE TRIGGER update_currency_rate_timestamp
AFTER UPDATE ON CurrencyRates
FOR EACH ROW
WHEN OLD.rate != NEW.rate
BEGIN
    UPDATE CurrencyRates SET updated_at = datetime('now') WHERE id = NEW.id;
END;

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
CREATE TABLE Clients (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    contact_person TEXT,
    telegram_id TEXT UNIQUE,
    wechat_id TEXT UNIQUE,
    phone TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–≤
CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    contact_person TEXT,
    wechat_id TEXT UNIQUE,
    phone TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    wechat_status TEXT CHECK(wechat_status IN ('–æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω', '–æ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω', '–Ω–µ–¥–∞–≤–Ω–æ')) DEFAULT '–æ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω',
    last_contact TIMESTAMP,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫
CREATE TABLE Orders (
    id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(status IN ('–Ω–æ–≤–∞—è', '–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ', '–ø—Ä–∏–æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∞', '–∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–∞', '–æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∞')),
    created_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    expected_delivery DATE,
    notes TEXT,
    total_cny REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    total_rub REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    total_usd REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    FOREIGN KEY(client_id) REFERENCES Clients(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(id)
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–∑—á–∏–∫–æ–≤
CREATE TABLE Carriers (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    contact_info TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –≥—Ä—É–∑–æ–≤
CREATE TABLE Shipments (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    order_id TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    tracking_number TEXT NOT NULL,
    carrier_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    current_status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(current_status IN ('—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ', '–æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω', '–≤ –ø—É—Ç–∏', '–Ω–∞ —Ç–∞–º–æ–∂–Ω–µ', '–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω', '–æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω')),
    estimated_departure DATE,
    estimated_arrival DATE,
    actual_departure DATE,
    actual_arrival DATE,
    last_update TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES Orders(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(carrier_id) REFERENCES Carriers(id)
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ —ç—Ç–∞–ø–æ–≤ –≥—Ä—É–∑–∞
CREATE TABLE ShipmentStages (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    shipment_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    stage_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    location TEXT NOT NULL,
    status_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status_description TEXT,
    is_current BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    FOREIGN KEY(shipment_id) REFERENCES Shipments(id)
);

-- –¢—Ä–∏–≥–≥–µ—Ä –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–µ–≥–æ —ç—Ç–∞–ø–∞
CREATE TRIGGER update_shipment_current_stage
AFTER INSERT ON ShipmentStages
FOR EACH ROW
BEGIN
    UPDATE ShipmentStages
    SET is_current = 0
    WHERE shipment_id = NEW.shipment_id;
    
    UPDATE ShipmentStages
    SET is_current = 1
    WHERE id = NEW.id;
    
    UPDATE Shipments
    SET 
        current_status = NEW.stage_name,
        last_update = NEW.status_date
    WHERE id = NEW.shipment_id;
END;

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–π
CREATE TABLE Communications (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    order_id TEXT,
    direction TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(direction IN ('–≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è', '–∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è')),
    channel TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(channel IN ('telegram', 'whatsapp', 'wechat')),
    contact_id INTEGER,
    contact_type TEXT CHECK(contact_type IN ('–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç', '–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫')),
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    is_read BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    is_forwarded BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    original_message_id INTEGER,
    attachment_path TEXT,
    is_forwarded_photo BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES Orders(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(original_message_id) REFERENCES Communications(id)
);
```

**–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–æ–±–∞–≤—å —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ**:

### 2. –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –ë–≠–ö–ï–ù–î–ê (FLASK)

**–§–∞–π–ª**: backend/main.py

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞–º–∏:
- –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π Flask –∏ Flask-CORS
- –ü–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–∏ –±–∞–∑—É –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ `database.init_db()`
- –î–æ–±–∞–≤—å health-check –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç `/api/health`
- –ó–∞—Ä–µ–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä—É–π blueprint –∏–∑ `api.orders`

**–í–ê–ñ–ù–û**: –£–±–µ–¥–∏—Å—å, —á—Ç–æ –∏–º–ø–æ—Ä—Ç—ã —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—Ç –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ, –¥–æ–±–∞–≤—å –ø—É—Ç—å –∫ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—É –≤ sys.path –ø—Ä–∏ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏.

**–§–∞–π–ª**: backend/api/orders.py

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π API –¥–ª—è –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫ —Å –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∞–º–∏:
- GET /api/orders - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫
- GET /api/orders/<order_id> - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏
- POST /api/orders - —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏
- PUT /api/orders/<order_id> - –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏
- DELETE /api/orders/<order_id> - —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏

**–í–ê–ñ–ù–û**: 
- –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π `order_service` –¥–ª—è –ª–æ–≥–∏–∫–∏
- –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—è–π –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø–æ–ª—è
- –í–æ–∑–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–π –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ HTTP-—Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å—ã
- –û–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–π –æ—à–∏–±–∫–∏

```javascript
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'
import Header from './components/layout/Header'
import Sidebar from './components/layout/Sidebar'
import OrdersList from './components/orders/OrdersList'
import OrderDetails from './components/orders/OrderDetails'
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'

function App() {
  const location = useLocation()
  const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false)
  
  // –ó–∞–∫—Ä—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –º–µ–Ω—é –ø—Ä–∏ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∞
  useEffect(() => {
    setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)
  }, [location])
  
  return (
    <Router>
      <div className="flex h-screen bg-gray-50 text-gray-900 overflow-hidden">
        {/* –ú–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –º–µ–Ω—é */}
        {isMobileMenuOpen && (
          <>
            <div 
              className="sidebar-overlay"
              onClick={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)}
            />
            <div className="mobile-sidebar">
              <Sidebar isMobile={true} onClose={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} />
            </div>
          </>
        )}
        
        {/* –°–∞–π–¥–±–∞—Ä –¥–ª—è –¥–µ—Å–∫—Ç–æ–ø–∞ */}
        <div className="hidden md:block">
          <Sidebar />
        </div>
        
        <div className="flex-1 flex flex-col overflow-hidden">
          <Header 
            onMobileMenuToggle={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen)} 
            isMobileMenuOpen={isMobileMenuOpen}
          />
          
          <main className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto bg-gray-50">
            <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-6">
              <Routes>
                <Route path="/" element={<OrdersList />} />
                <Route path="/orders/:id" element={<OrderDetails />} />
              </Routes>
            </div>
          </main>
        </div>
      </div>
    </Router>
  )
}

export default App
```

**–§–∞–π–ª—ã –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤**:

4. **OrdersList.jsx** - —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫

**–§–∞–π–ª—ã —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤**:

### 4. –¢–†–ï–ë–û–í–ê–ù–ò–Ø –ö –ö–ê–ß–ï–°–¢–í–£

**–î–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞ –∫–æ–¥–∞**:

1. **–°—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞**:

**–£–≤–µ–¥–æ–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è**:
- –ò–∫–æ–Ω–∫–∞ –∫–æ–ª–æ–∫–æ–ª—å—á–∏–∫–∞
- –ö—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—ã–π –±–µ–π–¥–∂ —Å –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö —É–≤–µ–¥–æ–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π
- –ü—Ä–∏ –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–∏: –≤—ã–ø–∞–¥–∞—é—â–∏–π —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ —É–≤–µ–¥–æ–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π

**–ü—Ä–æ—Ñ–∏–ª—å**:
- –ê–≤–∞—Ç–∞—Ä (–∫—Ä—É–≥ —Å –±—É–∫–≤–æ–π "–õ")
- –ò–º—è: "–õ–∏—Å—ë–Ω–æ–∫"
- –†–æ–ª—å: "–ú–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä" (–º–µ–ª–∫–∏–º —à—Ä–∏—Ñ—Ç–æ–º)
- –ü—Ä–∏ –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–∏: –≤—ã–ø–∞–¥–∞—é—â–µ–µ –º–µ–Ω—é —Å –æ–ø—Ü–∏—è–º–∏

### 3. –û–°–ù–û–í–ù–û–ï –†–ê–ë–û–ß–ï–ï –ü–†–û–°–¢–†–ê–ù–°–¢–í–û

**–°—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞**:
- –í–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å: –∑–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–æ–∫ —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–∞, —Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä—ã, –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π
- –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç: —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ —ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏–ª–∏ –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª–∏
- –ù–∏–∂–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å: –ø–∞–≥–∏–Ω–∞—Ü–∏—è (–ø—Ä–∏ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏)

**–î–ª—è –≤—Å–µ—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–æ–≤**:
- –ê–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø–æ—è–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
- –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–π –¥–∏–∑–∞–π–Ω –¥–ª—è –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤
- –ü–ª–∞–≤–Ω—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥—ã –º–µ–∂–¥—É —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏—è–º–∏

## üìã –î–ï–¢–ê–õ–¨–ù–û–ï –û–ü–ò–°–ê–ù–ò–ï –ö–ê–ñ–î–û–ô –í–ö–õ–ê–î–ö–ò

### 1. –í–ö–õ–ê–î–ö–ê "–ó–ê–Ø–í–ö–ò" (–ì–õ–ê–í–ù–ê–Ø)

**–í–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å**:
- –ó–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–æ–∫: "–ó–∞—è–≤–∫–∏" + –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, "–ó–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ (15)")
- –§–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä—ã: 
  * –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å: –≤—Å–µ, –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ, –≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ, –Ω–∞ —Ç–∞–º–æ–∂–Ω–µ, –∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ
  * –°–æ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞: –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–º–∏, —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–º–∏, —Å—É–º–º–∞ (–ø–æ —É–±—ã–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é), —Å—É–º–º–∞ (–ø–æ –≤–æ–∑—Ä–∞—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∏—é)
- –ü–æ–∏—Å–∫: –ø–æ–ª–µ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞ –ø–æ ID, –Ω–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏—é, –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç—É
- –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞: "–ù–æ–≤–∞—è –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∞" —Å –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–æ–π

**–°—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∞** (–Ω–∏–∂–µ –≤–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω–µ–π –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª–∏):
- –í—Å–µ–≥–æ –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫: 15
- –í —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ: 5
- –ù–∞ —Ç–∞–º–æ–∂–Ω–µ: 3
- –û–±—â–∞—è —Å—É–º–º–∞: 750,000.00 CNY

**–°–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫**:
- –ö–∞—Ä—Ç–æ—á–∫–∏ –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫ –≤ —Å–µ—Ç–∫–µ (3 –∫–æ–ª–æ–Ω–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –¥–µ—Å–∫—Ç–æ–ø–µ)
- –ö–∞–∂–¥–∞—è –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–æ—á–∫–∞ —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç:
  * –ó–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–æ–∫: "–ó–∞—è–≤–∫–∞ #2024-110" + —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å (—Ü–≤–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –±–µ–π–¥–∂)
  * –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ: –∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∫–æ–µ –Ω–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏
  * –ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç: –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–∞ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è + –∏–º—è
  * –ü–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫: –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–∞ –∑–∞–≤–æ–¥–∞ + –Ω–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ
  * –°—É–º–º–∞: 50,000.00 CNY (630,000.00 ‚ÇΩ / 700.00 $)
  * –î–∞—Ç–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è: 10 –æ–∫—Ç—è–±—Ä—è 2024
  * –ü—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–µ—Å—Å –≥—Ä—É–∑–∞ (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å): –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–µ—Å—Å-–±–∞—Ä —Å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º
  * –î–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è: "–ü–æ–¥—Ä–æ–±–Ω–µ–µ", "–û—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç—å"

**–î–µ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏** (–ø—Ä–∏ –∫–ª–∏–∫–µ –Ω–∞ –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–æ—á–∫—É):
- –í–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å: 
  * –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ "–ù–∞–∑–∞–¥", ID –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏, –Ω–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ
  * –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å (—Ü–≤–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–π)
  * –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π: —Ä–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ, —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ, —Å–∫–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
- –í–∫–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏:
  * –î–µ—Ç–∞–ª–∏: –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è, –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç, –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫, —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è
  * –°–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è: –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π –ø–æ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–µ
  * –ì—Ä—É–∑—ã: –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –æ –≥—Ä—É–∑–µ –∏ —ç—Ç–∞–ø—ã –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∏
  * –î–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã: —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –ø–æ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–µ
- –ù–∏–∂–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å: –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π ("–û—Ç–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É", "–†–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å")

### 2. –í–ö–õ–ê–î–ö–ê "–°–û–û–ë–©–ï–ù–ò–Ø" (–û–ë–Ø–ó–ê–¢–ï–õ–¨–ù–û –î–ï–¢–ê–õ–¨–ù–û)

**–í–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å**:
- –ó–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–æ–∫: "–°–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è" + –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, "–°–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è (3)")
- –§–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä—ã:
  * –í—Å–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è, –° –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º, –° –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–º, –ù–µ –ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ
- –ü–æ–∏—Å–∫: –ø–æ–ª–µ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞ –ø–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞–º –∏ —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–º–æ–º—É
- –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞: "–ù–æ–≤–æ–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ"

**–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–Ω–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è** (–Ω–∏–∂–µ –≤–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω–µ–π –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª–∏):
- –°–∏–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å —Å –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π: "–ó–¥–µ—Å—å –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –≤—Å–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Å–≤—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∞–º–∏. –í—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∏—Ç—å –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫—É –∏–ª–∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç—É, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫—É –Ω–∏–∂–µ."

**–°–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ —á–∞—Ç–æ–≤**:
- –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —á–∞—Ç —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç:
  * –ê–≤–∞—Ç–∞—Ä –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞ (–±—É–∫–≤–∞ –∏–ª–∏ –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–∞)
  * –ò–º—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞ –∏ —Ç–∏–ø (–ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç/–ü–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫)
  * –ü–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–µ–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ (–ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–µ 50 —Å–∏–º–≤–æ–ª–æ–≤)
  * –í—Ä–µ–º—è –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
  * –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å WeChat (–¥–ª—è –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–≤): –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω/–æ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω/–Ω–µ–¥–∞–≤–Ω–æ (—Å —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–æ–π)
  * –ë–µ–π–¥–∂ —Å –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π
  * –ü—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–∫ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è (–∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–∞)
- –ù–µ –ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤—ã–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω—ã –∂–∏—Ä–Ω—ã–º —à—Ä–∏—Ñ—Ç–æ–º
- –ü—Ä–∏ –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–∏: –ø–ª–∞–≤–Ω–æ–µ –∑–∞—Ç–µ–º–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ñ–æ–Ω–∞

**–û–∫–Ω–æ —á–∞—Ç–∞** (–ø—Ä–∏ –∫–ª–∏–∫–µ –Ω–∞ —á–∞—Ç):
- –í–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å:
  * –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥, –∏–º—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞, —Ç–∏–ø –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞
  * –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å WeChat (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫)
  * –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏: –∑–≤–æ–Ω–æ–∫, –≤–∏–¥–µ–æ, –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è
- –ò—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π:
  * –í—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–ª–µ–≤–∞ (—Å–µ—Ä—ã–π —Ñ–æ–Ω)
  * –ò—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∞ (—Å–∏–Ω–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞–¥–∏–µ–Ω—Ç)
  * –§–æ—Ç–æ–≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∏: —É–º–µ–Ω—å—à–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–µ–≤—å—é —Å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–≤–µ–ª–∏—á–µ–Ω–∏—è
  * –ü–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è: –æ—Ç–º–µ—á–µ–Ω—ã –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–æ–π
  * –í—Ä–µ–º—è –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∏ –ø–æ–¥ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–º —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º
  * –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –ø—Ä–æ—á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è –∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö (–∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–∞)
- –ù–∏–∂–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å:
  * –ü–æ–ª–µ –≤–≤–æ–¥–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
  * –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏: –ø—Ä–∏–∫—Ä–µ–ø–∏—Ç—å —Ñ–∞–π–ª, —Å–º–∞–π–ª—ã
  * –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∏

**–î–µ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–∞ "–°–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è"**:

1. **–ë–∞–∑–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö**:
   - –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ Communications —Å –ø–æ–ª—è–º–∏:
     * id: INTEGER PRIMARY KEY
     * order_id: TEXT (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É)
     * direction: TEXT CHECK(direction IN ('–≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è', '–∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è'))
     * channel: TEXT CHECK(channel IN ('telegram', 'whatsapp', 'wechat'))
     * contact_id: INTEGER (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞)
     * contact_type: TEXT CHECK(contact_type IN ('–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç', '–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫'))
     * content: TEXT
     * timestamp: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
     * is_read: BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0
     * is_forwarded: BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0
     * original_message_id: INTEGER (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –æ—Ä–∏–≥–∏–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ)
     * attachment_path: TEXT
     * is_forwarded_photo: BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0

2. **API —ç–Ω–¥–ø–æ–∏–Ω—Ç—ã**:
   - GET /api/messages - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–∞ —á–∞—Ç–æ–≤
   - GET /api/messages/thread/:contactId - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π
   - POST /api/messages - –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∞ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
   - PUT /api/messages/:id/read - –ø–æ–º–µ—Ç–∏—Ç—å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–∞–∫ –ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ
   - POST /api/messages/forward - –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞—Ç—å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–∑ –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞

3. **–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–Ω—ã–µ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏**:
   - getMessagesList() - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–∞ —á–∞—Ç–æ–≤
   - getThreadMessages(contactId) - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏
   - sendMessage(data) - –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
   - markAsRead(messageIds) - –ø–æ–º–µ—Ç–∏—Ç—å –∫–∞–∫ –ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ
   - processForwardedMessage(data) - –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π

4. **–û—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏**:
   - –î–ª—è WeChat —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω/–æ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–µ 5 –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç

### 3. –í–ö–õ–ê–î–ö–ê "–¢–†–ï–ö–ï–† –ì–†–£–ó–û–í"

**–î–µ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ –≥—Ä—É–∑–∞** (–ø—Ä–∏ –∫–ª–∏–∫–µ –Ω–∞ –≥—Ä—É–∑):

## üîó –í–ó–ê–ò–ú–û–î–ï–ô–°–¢–í–ò–ï –ú–ï–ñ–î–£ –í–ö–õ–ê–î–ö–ê–ú–ò

## üóÉÔ∏è –î–ï–¢–ê–õ–¨–ù–ê–Ø –°–¢–†–£–ö–¢–£–†–ê –ë–ê–ó–´ –î–ê–ù–ù–´–•

### –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ Currencies
- id: INTEGER PRIMARY KEY
- code: TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE (CNY, RUB, USD)
- name: TEXT NOT NULL
- symbol: TEXT NOT NULL
- is_purchase_base: BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
- is_reporting_base: BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
- created_at: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

### –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ CurrencyRates
- id: INTEGER PRIMARY KEY
- base_currency_id: INTEGER NOT NULL
- target_currency_id: INTEGER NOT NULL
- rate: REAL NOT NULL
- updated_at: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
- source: TEXT NOT NULL
- UNIQUE(base_currency_id, target_currency_id)
- FOREIGN KEY(base_currency_id) REFERENCES Currencies(id)
- FOREIGN KEY(target_currency_id) REFERENCES Currencies(id)

### –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ Clients
- id: INTEGER PRIMARY KEY
- name: TEXT NOT NULL
- contact_person: TEXT
- telegram_id: TEXT UNIQUE
- wechat_id: TEXT UNIQUE
- phone: TEXT
- email: TEXT
- created_at: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

### –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ Suppliers
- id: INTEGER PRIMARY KEY
- name: TEXT NOT NULL
- contact_person: TEXT
- wechat_id: TEXT UNIQUE
- phone: TEXT
- email: TEXT
- wechat_status: TEXT CHECK(wechat_status IN ('–æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω', '–æ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω', '–Ω–µ–¥–∞–≤–Ω–æ')) DEFAULT '–æ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω'
- last_contact: TIMESTAMP
- created_at: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

### –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ Orders

- name: TEXT NOT NULL
- description: TEXT
- status: TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(status IN ('–Ω–æ–≤–∞—è', '–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ', '–ø—Ä–∏–æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∞', '–∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–∞', '–æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∞'))
- created_date: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
- expected_delivery: DATE
- notes: TEXT
- total_cny: REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
- total_rub: REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
- total_usd: REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
- FOREIGN KEY(client_id) REFERENCES Clients(id)

- actual_departure: DATE

- location: TEXT NOT NULL

### –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ Communications

- contact_id: INTEGER
- contact_type: TEXT CHECK(contact_type IN ('–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç', '–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫'))

## üß± –î–ï–¢–ê–õ–¨–ù–´–ï –ò–ù–°–¢–†–£–ö–¶–ò–ò –î–õ–Ø CODEx AI

### 1. –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –ë–ê–ó–´ –î–ê–ù–ù–´–•

**–§–∞–π–ª**: backend/database/__init__.py

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—é `get_db()` –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫ –±–∞–∑–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—é `init_db()` –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∏ –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è. –ë–∞–∑–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω–∞ –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ `backend/database/cargo_manager.db`.

**–í–ê–ñ–ù–û**: –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Ñ–∞–π–ª –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–µ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç, –≤—ã–∑–æ–≤–∏ –∏—Å–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç–Ω—ã–º —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º.

**SQL-–∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –¥–ª—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ç–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü**:

```sql
-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç
CREATE TABLE Currencies (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    code TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
    is_purchase_base BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    is_reporting_base BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- –ó–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç—ã
INSERT INTO Currencies (code, name, symbol, is_purchase_base, is_reporting_base) VALUES
('CNY', '–ö–∏—Ç–∞–π—Å–∫–∏–π —é–∞–Ω—å', '¬•', 1, 0),
('RUB', '–†–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π —Ä—É–±–ª—å', '‚ÇΩ', 0, 1),
('USD', '–î–æ–ª–ª–∞—Ä –°–®–ê', '$', 0, 0);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç
CREATE TABLE CurrencyRates (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    base_currency_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    target_currency_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    rate REAL NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    source TEXT NOT NULL,
    UNIQUE(base_currency_id, target_currency_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(base_currency_id) REFERENCES Currencies(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(target_currency_id) REFERENCES Currencies(id)
);

-- –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—ã –¥–ª—è —É—Å–∫–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è
CREATE INDEX idx_currency_rates_base ON CurrencyRates(base_currency_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_currency_rates_target ON CurrencyRates(target_currency_id);

-- –ó–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º –±–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã
INSERT INTO CurrencyRates (base_currency_id, target_currency_id, rate, source)
SELECT 
    c1.id, c2.id, 
    CASE 
        WHEN c1.code = 'CNY' AND c2.code = 'RUB' THEN 12.60
        WHEN c1.code = 'CNY' AND c2.code = 'USD' THEN 0.14
        WHEN c1.code = 'USD' AND c2.code = 'RUB' THEN 92.50
        ELSE 1.0 
    END,
    '–¶–ë –†–§'
FROM Currencies c1, Currencies c2
WHERE 
    (c1.code = 'CNY' AND c2.code IN ('RUB', 'USD')) OR
    (c1.code = 'USD' AND c2.code = 'RUB');

-- –¢—Ä–∏–≥–≥–µ—Ä –¥–ª—è –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏
CREATE TRIGGER update_currency_rate_timestamp
AFTER UPDATE ON CurrencyRates
FOR EACH ROW
WHEN OLD.rate != NEW.rate
BEGIN
    UPDATE CurrencyRates SET updated_at = datetime('now') WHERE id = NEW.id;
END;

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤
CREATE TABLE Clients (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    contact_person TEXT,
    telegram_id TEXT UNIQUE,
    wechat_id TEXT UNIQUE,
    phone TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–≤
CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    contact_person TEXT,
    wechat_id TEXT UNIQUE,
    phone TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    wechat_status TEXT CHECK(wechat_status IN ('–æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω', '–æ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω', '–Ω–µ–¥–∞–≤–Ω–æ')) DEFAULT '–æ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω',
    last_contact TIMESTAMP,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫
CREATE TABLE Orders (
    id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(status IN ('–Ω–æ–≤–∞—è', '–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ', '–ø—Ä–∏–æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∞', '–∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–∞', '–æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∞')),
    created_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    expected_delivery DATE,
    notes TEXT,
    total_cny REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    total_rub REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    total_usd REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    FOREIGN KEY(client_id) REFERENCES Clients(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(id)
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–∑—á–∏–∫–æ–≤
CREATE TABLE Carriers (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    contact_info TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –≥—Ä—É–∑–æ–≤
CREATE TABLE Shipments (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    order_id TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    tracking_number TEXT NOT NULL,
    carrier_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    current_status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(current_status IN ('—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ', '–æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω', '–≤ –ø—É—Ç–∏', '–Ω–∞ —Ç–∞–º–æ–∂–Ω–µ', '–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω', '–æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω')),
    estimated_departure DATE,
    estimated_arrival DATE,
    actual_departure DATE,
    actual_arrival DATE,
    last_update TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES Orders(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(carrier_id) REFERENCES Carriers(id)
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ —ç—Ç–∞–ø–æ–≤ –≥—Ä—É–∑–∞
CREATE TABLE ShipmentStages (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    shipment_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    stage_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    location TEXT NOT NULL,
    status_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status_description TEXT,
    is_current BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    FOREIGN KEY(shipment_id) REFERENCES Shipments(id)
);

-- –¢—Ä–∏–≥–≥–µ—Ä –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–µ–≥–æ —ç—Ç–∞–ø–∞
CREATE TRIGGER update_shipment_current_stage
AFTER INSERT ON ShipmentStages
FOR EACH ROW
BEGIN
    UPDATE ShipmentStages
    SET is_current = 0
    WHERE shipment_id = NEW.shipment_id;
    
    UPDATE ShipmentStages
    SET is_current = 1
    WHERE id = NEW.id;
    
    UPDATE Shipments
    SET 
        current_status = NEW.stage_name,
        last_update = NEW.status_date
    WHERE id = NEW.shipment_id;
END;

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–π
CREATE TABLE Communications (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    order_id TEXT,
    direction TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(direction IN ('–≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è', '–∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è')),
    channel TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(channel IN ('telegram', 'whatsapp', 'wechat')),
    contact_id INTEGER,
    contact_type TEXT CHECK(contact_type IN ('–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç', '–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫')),
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    is_read BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    is_forwarded BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    original_message_id INTEGER,
    attachment_path TEXT,
    is_forwarded_photo BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES Orders(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(original_message_id) REFERENCES Communications(id)
);
```

**–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–æ–±–∞–≤—å —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ**:

### 2. –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –ë–≠–ö–ï–ù–î–ê (FLASK)

**–§–∞–π–ª**: backend/main.py

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π —Ñ–∞–π–ª –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞–º–∏:
- –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π Flask –∏ Flask-CORS
- –ü–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–∏ –±–∞–∑—É –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ `database.init_db()`
- –î–æ–±–∞–≤—å health-check –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç `/api/health`
- –ó–∞—Ä–µ–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä—É–π –≤—Å–µ blueprints –∏–∑ api

**–í–ê–ñ–ù–û**: –£–±–µ–¥–∏—Å—å, —á—Ç–æ –∏–º–ø–æ—Ä—Ç—ã —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—Ç –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ, –¥–æ–±–∞–≤—å –ø—É—Ç—å –∫ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—É –≤ sys.path –ø—Ä–∏ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏.

**–§–∞–π–ª—ã API**:

1. **orders.py**:
   - GET /api/orders - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫
   - GET /api/orders/<order_id> - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏
   - POST /api/orders - —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏
   - PUT /api/orders/<order_id> - –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏
   - DELETE /api/orders/<order_id> - —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏

2. **messages.py**:
   - GET /api/messages - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–∞ —á–∞—Ç–æ–≤
   - GET /api/messages/thread/<contact_id> - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π
   - POST /api/messages - –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∞ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
   - PUT /api/messages/read - –ø–æ–º–µ—Ç–∏—Ç—å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–∞–∫ –ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ
   - POST /api/messages/forward - –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞—Ç—å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–∑ –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞

3. **shipments.py**:
   - GET /api/shipments - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–∞ –≥—Ä—É–∑–æ–≤
   - GET /api/shipments/<shipment_id> - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª–µ–π –≥—Ä—É–∑–∞
   - POST /api/shipments - —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ –≥—Ä—É–∑–∞
   - PUT /api/shipments/<shipment_id> - –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≥—Ä—É–∑–∞

4. **currency.py**:
   - GET /api/currency/rates - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–∏—Ö –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤
   - POST /api/currency/update-now - –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—É–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤

**–í–ê–ñ–ù–û**: 
- –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–µ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã –¥–ª—è –ª–æ–≥–∏–∫–∏
- –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—è–π –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø–æ–ª—è
- –í–æ–∑–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–π –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ HTTP-—Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å—ã
- –û–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–π –æ—à–∏–±–∫–∏
- –î–ª—è —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π —É–±–µ–¥–∏—Å—å, —á—Ç–æ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –ª–æ–≥–∏–∫–∞ –¥–ª—è –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–∞ –ø—Ä–æ—á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è

**–§–∞–π–ª—ã —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤**:

1. **order_service.py**:
   - get_all_orders()
   - get_order_by_id(order_id)
   - create_order(data)
   - update_order(order_id, data)
   - delete_order(order_id)

**–í–ê–ñ–ù–û**:
- –í—Å–µ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω—ã –∏–º–µ—Ç—å –ø–æ–¥—Ä–æ–±–Ω—ã–µ docstrings
- –î–æ–±–∞–≤—å –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫
- –ü—Ä–∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏/–æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –∫–æ–Ω–≤–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ä—É–π —Å—É–º–º—É –≤ —Ç—Ä–∏ –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç—ã
- –î–ª—è —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–π –ª–æ–≥–∏–∫—É –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–∞ –ø—Ä–æ—á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å —Ä–æ—É—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–æ–º:
```javascript
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'
import Header from './components/layout/Header'
import Sidebar from './components/layout/Sidebar'
import OrdersList from './components/orders/OrdersList'
import OrderDetails from './components/orders/OrderDetails'
import MessagesList from './components/messages/MessagesList'
import MessageThread from './components/messages/MessageThread'
import ShipmentsList from './components/shipments/ShipmentsList'
import ShipmentDetails from './components/shipments/ShipmentDetails'
import DocumentsList from './components/documents/DocumentsList'
import ClientsList from './components/clients/ClientsList'
import SuppliersList from './components/suppliers/SuppliersList'
import ProfileSettings from './components/settings/ProfileSettings'
import NotificationSettings from './components/settings/NotificationSettings'
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'

function App() {
  const location = useLocation()
  const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false)
  
  // –ó–∞–∫—Ä—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –º–µ–Ω—é –ø—Ä–∏ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –º–∞—Ä—à—Ä—É—Ç–∞
  useEffect(() => {
    setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)
  }, [location])
  
  return (
    <Router>
      <div className="flex h-screen bg-gray-50 text-gray-900 overflow-hidden">
        {/* –ú–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –º–µ–Ω—é */}
        {isMobileMenuOpen && (
          <>
            <div 
              className="sidebar-overlay"
              onClick={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)}
            />
            <div className="mobile-sidebar">
              <Sidebar isMobile={true} onClose={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} />
            </div>
          </>
        )}
        
        {/* –°–∞–π–¥–±–∞—Ä –¥–ª—è –¥–µ—Å–∫—Ç–æ–ø–∞ */}
        <div className="hidden md:block">
          <Sidebar />
        </div>
        
        <div className="flex-1 flex flex-col overflow-hidden">
          <Header 
            onMobileMenuToggle={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen)} 
            isMobileMenuOpen={isMobileMenuOpen}
          />
          
          <main className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto bg-gray-50">
            <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-6">
              <Routes>
                {/* –ó–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ */}
                <Route path="/" element={<OrdersList />} />
                <Route path="/orders/:id" element={<OrderDetails />} />
                
                {/* –°–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è */}
                <Route path="/messages" element={<MessagesList />} />
                <Route path="/messages/thread/:contactId" element={<MessageThread />} />
                
                {/* –ì—Ä—É–∑—ã */}
                <Route path="/shipments" element={<ShipmentsList />} />
                <Route path="/shipments/:id" element={<ShipmentDetails />} />
                
                {/* –î–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã */}
                <Route path="/documents" element={<DocumentsList />} />
                
                {/* –ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç—ã */}
                <Route path="/clients" element={<ClientsList />} />
                
                {/* –ü–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∏ */}
                <Route path="/suppliers" element={<SuppliersList />} />
                
                {/* –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ */}
                <Route path="/settings/profile" element={<ProfileSettings />} />
                <Route path="/settings/notifications" element={<NotificationSettings />} />
              </Routes>
            </div>
          </main>
        </div>
      </div>
    </Router>
  )
}

export default App
```

**–§–∞–π–ª—ã –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤**:

**–§–∞–π–ª—ã —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤**:

1. **api.js** - –±–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–π —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å API

4. **messageActions.js** - –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ Redux

```
### USER
–¢–∞–∫ –∂–µ —Ç—ã –∑–∞–±—ã–ª —É–ø—è–Ω—É—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ–∞—Ç—å —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ whatsapp telegramm –∏ we chat 

–∏ –∑–∞–±—ã–ª —Ä–∞—Å—Å–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å —á—Ç–æ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –µ—Å–ª–∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç –¥–æ–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∏–ø –ø—Ä–∏—Å—ã–ª–∞–µ—Ç –æ—Å–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —á—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–∞–º–∞ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–µ—Ç –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–≥—Ä—É–∂–∞–µ—Ç –Ω—É–∂–Ω—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤ –ø–æ–ª–µ —Å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞

–ï—â—ë –æ–Ω –¥–æ–ª–∂–µ–Ω —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ä–∞–±–æ–±–∞—Ç—å –≤–µ—Å—å —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª —á—Ç–æ –º—ã –ø—Ä–∏–¥—É–º–∞–ª–∏ —Ä–∞—Å–ø–∏—à–∏ —á—Ç–æ –æ–Ω –¥–æ–ª–∂–µ–Ω —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å —á—Ç–æ –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏ –∏ –∫–∞–∫ –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∏—Ç—å !
```

## üìã –î–ï–¢–ê–õ–¨–ù–û–ï –û–ü–ò–°–ê–ù–ò–ï –ö–û–ù–ï–ß–ù–û–ì–û –ò–ù–¢–ï–†–§–ï–ô–°–ê (–û–ë–ù–û–í–õ–ï–ù–û)

### 1. –ê–í–¢–û–ú–ê–¢–ò–ß–ï–°–ö–ê–Ø –ò–ù–¢–ï–ì–†–ê–¶–ò–Ø –° –ú–ï–°–°–ï–ù–î–ñ–ï–†–ê–ú–ò

**–í–∞–∂–Ω–∞—è —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å**:
- –ü—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ç –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä—ã (Telegram, WhatsApp, WeChat), —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏:
  1. –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–µ—Ç –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è –ø–æ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä—É —Ç–µ–ª–µ—Ñ–æ–Ω–∞ –∏–ª–∏ ID
  2. –ù–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â—É—é –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É (–µ—Å–ª–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç —É–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏)

  4. –ü–æ–º–µ—á–∞–µ—Ç —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–∞–∫ "–Ω–µ–ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–µ"
  5. –û—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ—Ç —É–≤–µ–¥–æ–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å–µ

**–ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏**:
- –í–∫–ª–∞–¥–∫–∞ "–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏" ‚Üí "–ò–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏"
- –î–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞: –ø–æ–ª–µ –¥–ª—è –≤–≤–æ–¥–∞ —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω–∞/API –∫–ª—é—á–∞
- –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ "–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∏—Ç—å –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ"
- –û—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–∞ –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è (–∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ/–Ω–µ–∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ)
- –õ–æ–≥ –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è (–ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏—è)

**–î–µ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏**:

1. **Telegram**:
   - –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π Telegram Bot API
   - –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π —ç–Ω–¥–ø–æ–∏–Ω—Ç `/api/telegram/webhook`
   - –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π –≤–µ–±—Ö—É–∫ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ `setWebhook`
   - –û–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–π –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è:
     * –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–π –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è –ø–æ `message.from.id`
     * –°–æ–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–π —Å –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏/–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –ø–æ `telegram_id`
     * –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, #2024-110), –ø—Ä–∏–≤—è–∂–∏ –∫ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–µ
     * –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞–π —á–∞—Ç –∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –±–∞–∑–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö

2. **WhatsApp**:
   - –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π Twilio API –¥–ª—è WhatsApp
   - –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π —ç–Ω–¥–ø–æ–∏–Ω—Ç `/api/whatsapp/webhook`
   - –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π –≤–µ–±—Ö—É–∫ –≤ Twilio Console
   - –û–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–π –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è:
     * –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–π –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è –ø–æ `From` (–Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä —Ç–µ–ª–µ—Ñ–æ–Ω–∞)
     * –°–æ–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–π —Å –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏/–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –ø–æ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä—É —Ç–µ–ª–µ—Ñ–æ–Ω–∞
     * –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏, –ø—Ä–∏–≤—è–∂–∏ –∫ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–µ
     * –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞–π —á–∞—Ç –∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –±–∞–∑–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö

3. **WeChat**:
   - –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π WeChat Official Account API
   - –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π —ç–Ω–¥–ø–æ–∏–Ω—Ç `/api/wechat/webhook`
   - –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π –≤–µ–±—Ö—É–∫ –≤ WeChat Developer Center
   - –û–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–π –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è:
     * –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–π –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è –ø–æ `FromUserName`
     * –°–æ–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–π —Å –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –ø–æ `wechat_id`
     * –û—Ç—Å–ª–µ–∂–∏–≤–∞–π —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω/–æ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω –ø–æ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏
     * –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–≤–∞–π —á–∞—Ç –∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –±–∞–∑–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö

**–ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞/–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞**:

1. **–õ–æ–≥–∏–∫–∞ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è**:
   - –ü—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏–∑ –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞:
     * –ò–∑–≤–ª–µ–∫–∏ –∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ—Ä –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è (–Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä —Ç–µ–ª–µ—Ñ–æ–Ω–∞ –∏–ª–∏ ID)
     * –ü–æ–∏—â–∏ –≤ –±–∞–∑–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–≤ —Å —Å–æ–≤–ø–∞–¥–∞—é—â–∏–º –∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º
     * –ï—Å–ª–∏ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω, –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏ —Ç–∏–ø –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞ (–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫)
     * –ï—Å–ª–∏ –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–π –Ω–æ–≤—É—é –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–º–µ—Ç–∫–æ–π "–ù–µ–∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç"

2. **–û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏**:
   - –ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–π —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ (–ø–∞—Ç—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω: #XXXX-XXX –∏–ª–∏ XXXX-XXX)
   - –ï—Å–ª–∏ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏, –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—å –µ–≥–æ –≤ –±–∞–∑–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
   - –ï—Å–ª–∏ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∞ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç, –ø—Ä–∏–≤—è–∂–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–µ
   - –ï—Å–ª–∏ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∞ –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω–∞, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–π –Ω–æ–≤—É—é –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É —Å –ø–æ–º–µ—Ç–∫–æ–π "–ó–∞—è–≤–∫–∞ –∏–∑ –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞"

3. **–û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π**:
   - –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–æ (forwarded), –ø–æ–º–µ—Ç—å –µ–≥–æ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–æ–π
   - –°–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏ –æ—Ä–∏–≥–∏–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –±–∞–∑–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
   - –ü—Ä–∏ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –≤ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å–µ –ø–æ–∫–∞–∂–∏, —á—Ç–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–æ

**–ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å –¥–ª—è –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π**:
- –ü—Ä–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å—ã–ª–∫–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏–∑ –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞ –≤ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—É:
  * –í –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å–µ –ø–æ—è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–æ—á–∫–∞ —Å –æ—Ä–∏–≥–∏–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º
  * –ü–æ–º–µ—Ç–∫–∞ "–ü–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–æ –∏–∑ [–º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä]"
  * –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ "–°–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É" (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –Ω–µ—Ç –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ –≤ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–µ)
  * –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –ø–æ–¥–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –≤ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏

### 2. –ò–ù–¢–ï–ì–†–ê–¶–ò–Ø –í–ê–õ–Æ–¢ –í –†–ï–ê–õ–¨–ù–û–ú –í–†–ï–ú–ï–ù–ò

**–ò—Å—Ç–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö**:
- –¶–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –±–∞–Ω–∫ –†–§ (–¥–ª—è RUB)
- Open Exchange Rates (–¥–ª—è CNY, USD)
- –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ–∑–µ—Ä–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–ø–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è

**–†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è**:

1. **–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤**:
   - –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π `currency_service.py` —Å —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è–º–∏:
     * `get_currency_rates()` - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–∏—Ö –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤
     * `update_currency_rates()` - –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—É–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ
     * `schedule_daily_updates()` - —Ä–∞—Å–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –µ–∂–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
     * `get_historical_rates(date)` - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö

2. **API —ç–Ω–¥–ø–æ–∏–Ω—Ç—ã**:
   - GET /api/currency/rates - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–∏—Ö –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤
   - POST /api/currency/update-now - –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—É–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ
   - GET /api/currency/history?date=YYYY-MM-DD - –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤

3. **–ú–µ—Ö–∞–Ω–∏–∑–º –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è**:
   - –ï–∂–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–æ–µ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ 8:00 –ø–æ –ú–°–ö
   - –†–µ–∑–µ—Ä–≤–Ω—ã–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ –Ω–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ
   - –ö—ç—à–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–ª—è –º–∏–Ω–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤
   - –õ–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è

4. **–§—Ä–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω–¥-–∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è**:
   - –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–µ 24 —á–∞—Å–∞
   - –í–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä—É—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
   - –û—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
   - –ò–Ω–¥–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–∞ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è (–∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞, —É—Å–ø–µ—Ö, –æ—à–∏–±–∫–∞)

### 3. –î–ï–¢–ê–õ–¨–ù–û–ï –û–ü–ò–°–ê–ù–ò–ï –†–ê–ó–î–ï–õ–ê "–°–û–û–ë–©–ï–ù–ò–Ø" (–û–ë–ù–û–í–õ–ï–ù–û)

**–í–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å**:
- –ó–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–æ–∫: "–°–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è" + –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä, "–°–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è (3)")
- –§–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä—ã:
  * –í—Å–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è, –° –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º, –° –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–º, –ù–µ –ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ, –ù–æ–≤—ã–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏
- –ü–æ–∏—Å–∫: –ø–æ–ª–µ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞ –ø–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞–º –∏ —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–º–æ–º—É
- –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞: "–ù–æ–≤–æ–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ"

**–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–Ω–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è** (–Ω–∏–∂–µ –≤–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω–µ–π –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª–∏):
- –°–∏–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å —Å –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π: "–ó–¥–µ—Å—å –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –≤—Å–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Å–≤—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∞–º–∏. –í—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä–æ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∏—Ç—å –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫—É –∏–ª–∏ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç—É, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—è –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫—É –Ω–∏–∂–µ."

**–°–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ —á–∞—Ç–æ–≤**:
- –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —á–∞—Ç —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç:
  * –ê–≤–∞—Ç–∞—Ä –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞ (–±—É–∫–≤–∞ –∏–ª–∏ –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–∞)
  * –ò–º—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞ –∏ —Ç–∏–ø (–ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç/–ü–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫)
  * –ü–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–µ–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ (–ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–µ 50 —Å–∏–º–≤–æ–ª–æ–≤)
  * –í—Ä–µ–º—è –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
  * –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å WeChat (–¥–ª—è –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–≤): –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω/–æ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω/–Ω–µ–¥–∞–≤–Ω–æ (—Å —Ü–≤–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–æ–π)
  * –ë–µ–π–¥–∂ —Å –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π
  * –ü—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–∫ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è (–∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–∞)
  * –ú–µ—Ç–∫–∞ "–ù–æ–≤–∞—è –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∞" (–µ—Å–ª–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏)
- –ù–µ –ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤—ã–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω—ã –∂–∏—Ä–Ω—ã–º —à—Ä–∏—Ñ—Ç–æ–º
- –ü—Ä–∏ –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–∏: –ø–ª–∞–≤–Ω–æ–µ –∑–∞—Ç–µ–º–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ñ–æ–Ω–∞

**–û–∫–Ω–æ —á–∞—Ç–∞** (–ø—Ä–∏ –∫–ª–∏–∫–µ –Ω–∞ —á–∞—Ç):
- –í–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å:
  * –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥, –∏–º—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞, —Ç–∏–ø –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞
  * –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å WeChat (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫)
  * –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏: –∑–≤–æ–Ω–æ–∫, –≤–∏–¥–µ–æ, –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è
- –ò—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π:
  * –í—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–ª–µ–≤–∞ (—Å–µ—Ä—ã–π —Ñ–æ–Ω)
  * –ò—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∞ (—Å–∏–Ω–∏–π –≥—Ä–∞–¥–∏–µ–Ω—Ç)
  * –§–æ—Ç–æ–≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∏: —É–º–µ–Ω—å—à–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–µ–≤—å—é —Å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–≤–µ–ª–∏—á–µ–Ω–∏—è
  * –ü–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è: –æ—Ç–º–µ—á–µ–Ω—ã –∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–æ–π –∏ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –≤ –≤–∏–¥–µ –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–æ—á–∫–∏
  * –í—Ä–µ–º—è –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∏ –ø–æ–¥ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–º —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º
  * –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –ø—Ä–æ—á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è –∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö (–∏–∫–æ–Ω–∫–∞)
  * –ü—Ä–∏ –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –Ω–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ: –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ "–°–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É"
- –ù–∏–∂–Ω—è—è –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å:
  * –ü–æ–ª–µ –≤–≤–æ–¥–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
  * –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∏: –ø—Ä–∏–∫—Ä–µ–ø–∏—Ç—å —Ñ–∞–π–ª, —Å–º–∞–π–ª—ã, –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞—Ç—å
  * –ö–Ω–æ–ø–∫–∞ –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∏

**–û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π**:
- –ü—Ä–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å—ã–ª–∫–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏–∑ –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞:
  * –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ —Ä–∞—Å–ø–æ–∑–Ω–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ (–µ—Å–ª–∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å)
  * –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ—Ç –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–æ—á–∫—É —Å –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø—Ä–æ—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–æ–º —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
  * –ï—Å–ª–∏ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω, –ø–æ–¥—Å–≤–µ—á–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç –µ–≥–æ –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ—Ç –ø–µ—Ä–µ–π—Ç–∏ –∫ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–µ
  * –ï—Å–ª–∏ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ—Ç —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –Ω–æ–≤—É—é –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É
  * –ü—Ä–∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –∑–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ—Ç –ø–æ–ª—è –∏–∑ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è

**–ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞/–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞**:
- –ü—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è:
  * –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–µ—Ç –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è –ø–æ ID –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞
  * –°–æ–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç —Å –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏/–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –≤ –±–∞–∑–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
  * –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Å–æ–≤–ø–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω–æ, –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –ø–æ–¥–≥—Ä—É–∂–∞–µ—Ç –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å
  * –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Å–æ–≤–ø–∞–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω–æ, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–æ–≤—É—é –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å—å –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ—Ç –∑–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç—å –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ

### 4. –î–ï–¢–ê–õ–¨–ù–ê–Ø –°–¢–†–£–ö–¢–£–†–ê –ë–ê–ó–´ –î–ê–ù–ù–´–• (–û–ë–ù–û–í–õ–ï–ù–û)

### –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ Communications (–æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è)
- id: INTEGER PRIMARY KEY
- order_id: TEXT (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É)
- direction: TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(direction IN ('–≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è', '–∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è'))
- channel: TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(channel IN ('telegram', 'whatsapp', 'wechat'))
- contact_id: INTEGER
- contact_type: TEXT CHECK(contact_type IN ('–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç', '–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫', '–Ω–µ–∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–π'))
- content: TEXT NOT NULL
- timestamp: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
- is_read: BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
- is_forwarded: BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
- original_message_id: INTEGER (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –æ—Ä–∏–≥–∏–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ)
- attachment_path: TEXT
- is_forwarded_photo: BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
- detected_order_id: TEXT (–∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏)
- is_new_order_candidate: BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 (–∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç –Ω–∞ –Ω–æ–≤—É—é –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É)
- FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES Orders(id)
- FOREIGN KEY(original_message_id) REFERENCES Communications(id)

### –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ MessengerIntegrations
- id: INTEGER PRIMARY KEY
- channel: TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(channel IN ('telegram', 'whatsapp', 'wechat'))
- api_key: TEXT
- webhook_url: TEXT
- is_active: BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
- last_connected: TIMESTAMP
- status: TEXT CHECK(status IN ('–∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–µ–Ω', '–Ω–µ–∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–µ–Ω', '–æ—à–∏–±–∫–∞'))
- error_message: TEXT

## üß± –î–ï–¢–ê–õ–¨–ù–´–ï –ò–ù–°–¢–†–£–ö–¶–ò–ò –î–õ–Ø CODEx AI (–û–ë–ù–û–í–õ–ï–ù–û)

### 1. –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –ë–ê–ó–´ –î–ê–ù–ù–´–•

**–§–∞–π–ª**: backend/database/__init__.py

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—é `get_db()` –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫ –±–∞–∑–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—é `init_db()` –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∏ –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è. –ë–∞–∑–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω–∞ –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ `backend/database/cargo_manager.db`.

**–í–ê–ñ–ù–û**: –ï—Å–ª–∏ —Ñ–∞–π–ª –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–µ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç, –≤—ã–∑–æ–≤–∏ –∏—Å–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç–Ω—ã–º —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º.

**SQL-–∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –¥–ª—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è —Ç–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü** (–æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ):

```sql
-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –∫–æ–º–º—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–π (–æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è)
CREATE TABLE Communications (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    order_id TEXT,
    direction TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(direction IN ('–≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è', '–∏—Å—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∞—è')),
    channel TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(channel IN ('telegram', 'whatsapp', 'wechat')),
    contact_id INTEGER,
    contact_type TEXT CHECK(contact_type IN ('–∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç', '–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫', '–Ω–µ–∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–π')),
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    is_read BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    is_forwarded BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    original_message_id INTEGER,
    attachment_path TEXT,
    is_forwarded_photo BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    detected_order_id TEXT,
    is_new_order_candidate BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    FOREIGN KEY(order_id) REFERENCES Orders(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(original_message_id) REFERENCES Communications(id)
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–π —Å –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏
CREATE TABLE MessengerIntegrations (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    channel TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(channel IN ('telegram', 'whatsapp', 'wechat')),
    api_key TEXT,
    webhook_url TEXT,
    is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    last_connected TIMESTAMP,
    status TEXT CHECK(status IN ('–∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–µ–Ω', '–Ω–µ–∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–µ–Ω', '–æ—à–∏–±–∫–∞')),
    error_message TEXT,
    UNIQUE(channel)
);

-- –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—ã –¥–ª—è —É—Å–∫–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ–∏—Å–∫–∞
CREATE INDEX idx_communications_order ON Communications(order_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_communications_contact ON Communications(contact_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_communications_timestamp ON Communications(timestamp DESC);
CREATE INDEX idx_communications_order_candidate ON Communications(is_new_order_candidate) WHERE is_new_order_candidate = 1;
```

**–ü–æ—Å–ª–µ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –±–∞–∑—ã –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–æ–±–∞–≤—å —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ** (–æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ):

```sql
-- –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è (–æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ)
```

### 2. –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –ë–≠–ö–ï–ù–î–ê (FLASK) - –û–ë–ù–û–í–õ–ï–ù–û

**–§–∞–π–ª—ã API –¥–ª—è –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–æ–≤**:

1. **telegram.py**:
   - POST /api/telegram/webhook - –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π –æ—Ç Telegram
   - GET /api/telegram/status - –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏
   - POST /api/telegram/send - –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ Telegram

2. **whatsapp.py**:
   - POST /api/whatsapp/webhook - –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π –æ—Ç WhatsApp
   - GET /api/whatsapp/status - –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏
   - POST /api/whatsapp/send - –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ WhatsApp

3. **wechat.py**:
   - POST /api/wechat/webhook - –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π –æ—Ç WeChat
   - GET /api/wechat/status - –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏
   - POST /api/wechat/send - –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ WeChat
   - GET /api/wechat/statuses - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–æ–≤ WeChat –¥–ª—è –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–≤

**–í–ê–ñ–ù–û**: 
- –î–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–π –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π
- –†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–π –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞/–ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞
- –†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–π —Ä–∞—Å–ø–æ–∑–Ω–∞–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ –≤ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
- –†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–π –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π
- –í–æ–∑–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–π –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ HTTP-—Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å—ã
- –û–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–π –æ—à–∏–±–∫–∏

**–§–∞–π–ª—ã —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å–æ–≤ –¥–ª—è –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–æ–≤**:

1. **telegram_service.py**:
   - handle_webhook(data) - –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π
   - send_message(contact, message) - –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
   - setup_webhook() - –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –≤–µ–±—Ö—É–∫–∞
   - get_status() - –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏
   - identify_contact(data) - –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç–∞
   - detect_order_id(message) - —Ä–∞—Å–ø–æ–∑–Ω–∞–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏

2. **whatsapp_service.py**:
   - handle_webhook(data) - –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π

   - handle_webhook(data) - –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π

**–í–ê–ñ–ù–û**:

### 3. –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –§–†–û–ù–¢–ï–ù–î–ê (REACT) - –û–ë–ù–û–í–õ–ï–ù–û

**–§–∞–π–ª**: frontend/src/components/messages/MessageForwarding.jsx

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç –¥–ª—è –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π:
```javascript
import React from 'react'
import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'
import { ArrowLeft, ArrowRight, FileText, Plus } from 'lucide-react'
import { createOrderFromForwardedMessage } from '../../services/messageActions'

const MessageForwarding = ({ message }) => {
  const dispatch = useDispatch()
  const [isCreatingOrder, setIsCreatingOrder] = useState(false)
  
  const handleCreateOrder = () => {
    setIsCreatingOrder(true)
    dispatch(createOrderFromForwardedMessage(message.id))
      .then(() => setIsCreatingOrder(false))
  }
  
  // –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—è–µ–º, —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç –ª–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏
  const detectedOrderId = message.detected_order_id
  const isNewOrderCandidate = message.is_new_order_candidate
  
  return (
    <div className="bg-gray-50 border border-gray-200 rounded-xl p-4 mb-4">
      <div className="flex items-start">
        <div className="bg-blue-100 p-2 rounded-lg mr-3 mt-0.5">
          <FileText size={18} className="text-blue-600" />
        </div>
        
        <div className="flex-1">
          <div className="flex justify-between items-start mb-2">
            <div className="font-medium text-gray-900">–ü–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ</div>
            <span className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 text-xs rounded-full">
              {message.channel.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + message.channel.slice(1)}
            </span>
          </div>
          
          <p className="text-gray-700 mb-3">{message.content}</p>
          
          <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
            {detectedOrderId && (
              <div className="flex items-center bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 px-2 py-1 rounded text-sm">
                <ArrowLeft size={14} className="mr-1" />
                –û–±–Ω–∞—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∞ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∞ #{detectedOrderId}
              </div>
            )}
            
            {isNewOrderCandidate && (
              <div className="flex items-center bg-yellow-50 text-yellow-700 px-2 py-1 rounded text-sm">
                <FileText size={14} className="mr-1" />
                –ö–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç –Ω–∞ –Ω–æ–≤—É—é –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
          
          <div className="mt-3 flex space-x-2">
            {detectedOrderId ? (
              <Link 
                to={`/orders/${detectedOrderId}`} 
                className="button-primary px-3 py-1.5 rounded-lg flex items-center text-sm"
              >
                <ArrowRight size={14} className="mr-1" />
                –ü–µ—Ä–µ–π—Ç–∏ –∫ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–µ
              </Link>
            ) : (
              <button
                onClick={handleCreateOrder}
                disabled={isCreatingOrder}
                className="button-primary px-3 py-1.5 rounded-lg flex items-center text-sm"
              >
                {isCreatingOrder ? (
                  <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-4 w-4 border-t-2 border-b-2 border-white mr-2"></div>
                ) : (
                  <Plus size={14} className="mr-1" />
                )}
                –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É
              </button>
            )}
            
            <button className="button-secondary px-3 py-1.5 rounded-lg text-sm">
              –ü—Ä–æ–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}

export default MessageForwarding
```

**–§–∞–π–ª**: frontend/src/services/messageActions.js (–æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π)

–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ Redux:
```javascript
import api from './api'

export const FETCH_MESSAGES_REQUEST = 'FETCH_MESSAGES_REQUEST'
export const FETCH_MESSAGES_SUCCESS = 'FETCH_MESSAGES_SUCCESS'
export const FETCH_MESSAGES_FAILURE = 'FETCH_MESSAGES_FAILURE'

export const FETCH_MESSAGE_THREAD_REQUEST = 'FETCH_MESSAGE_THREAD_REQUEST'
export const FETCH_MESSAGE_THREAD_SUCCESS = 'FETCH_MESSAGE_THREAD_SUCCESS'
export const FETCH_MESSAGE_THREAD_FAILURE = 'FETCH_MESSAGE_THREAD_FAILURE'

export const SEND_MESSAGE_REQUEST = 'SEND_MESSAGE_REQUEST'
export const SEND_MESSAGE_SUCCESS = 'SEND_MESSAGE_SUCCESS'
export const SEND_MESSAGE_FAILURE = 'SEND_MESSAGE_FAILURE'

export const MARK_AS_READ_REQUEST = 'MARK_AS_READ_REQUEST'
export const MARK_AS_READ_SUCCESS = 'MARK_AS_READ_SUCCESS'
export const MARK_AS_READ_FAILURE = 'MARK_AS_READ_FAILURE'

export const CREATE_ORDER_FROM_FORWARDED_MESSAGE_REQUEST = 'CREATE_ORDER_FROM_FORWARDED_MESSAGE_REQUEST'
export const CREATE_ORDER_FROM_FORWARDED_MESSAGE_SUCCESS = 'CREATE_ORDER_FROM_FORWARDED_MESSAGE_SUCCESS'
export const CREATE_ORDER_FROM_FORWARDED_MESSAGE_FAILURE = 'CREATE_ORDER_FROM_FORWARDED_MESSAGE_FAILURE'

// –ü–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–∞ —á–∞—Ç–æ–≤
export const fetchMessages = () => async (dispatch) => {
  dispatch({ type: FETCH_MESSAGES_REQUEST })
  
  try {
    const response = await api.get('/messages')
    dispatch({
      type: FETCH_MESSAGES_SUCCESS,
      payload: response.data
    })
  } catch (error) {
    dispatch({
      type: FETCH_MESSAGES_FAILURE,
      payload: error.message || '–ù–µ —É–¥–∞–ª–æ—Å—å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∏—Ç—å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è'
    })
  }
}

// –ü–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π
export const fetchMessageThread = (contactId) => async (dispatch) => {
  dispatch({ type: FETCH_MESSAGE_THREAD_REQUEST })
  
  try {
    const response = await api.get(`/messages/thread/${contactId}`)
    dispatch({
      type: FETCH_MESSAGE_THREAD_SUCCESS,
      payload: {
        contactId,
        messages: response.data.messages
      }
    })
  } catch (error) {
    dispatch({
      type: FETCH_MESSAGE_THREAD_FAILURE,
      payload: error.message || '–ù–µ —É–¥–∞–ª–æ—Å—å –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∏—Ç—å –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—é —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π'
    })
  }
}

// –û—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∞ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
export const sendMessage = (messageData) => async (dispatch) => {
  dispatch({ type: SEND_MESSAGE_REQUEST })
  
  try {
    const response = await api.post('/messages', messageData)
    dispatch({
      type: SEND_MESSAGE_SUCCESS,
      payload: response.data
    })
    return response.data
  } catch (error) {
    dispatch({
      type: SEND_MESSAGE_FAILURE,
      payload: error.message || '–ù–µ —É–¥–∞–ª–æ—Å—å –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ'
    })
    throw error
  }
}

// –ü–æ–º–µ—Ç–∏—Ç—å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–∞–∫ –ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ
export const markAsRead = (messageIds) => async (dispatch) => {
  dispatch({ type: MARK_AS_READ_REQUEST })
  
  try {
    await api.put('/messages/read', { messageIds })
    dispatch({
      type: MARK_AS_READ_SUCCESS,
      payload: messageIds
    })
  } catch (error) {
    dispatch({
      type: MARK_AS_READ_FAILURE,
      payload: error.message || '–ù–µ —É–¥–∞–ª–æ—Å—å –ø–æ–º–µ—Ç–∏—Ç—å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–∞–∫ –ø—Ä–æ—á–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ'
    })
  }
}

// –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ –∏–∑ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
export const createOrderFromForwardedMessage = (messageId) => async (dispatch) => {
  dispatch({ type: CREATE_ORDER_FROM_FORWARDED_MESSAGE_REQUEST })
  
  try {
    const response = await api.post('/messages/forward', { messageId })
    dispatch({
      type: CREATE_ORDER_FROM_FORWARDED_MESSAGE_SUCCESS,
      payload: response.data
    })
    return response.data
  } catch (error) {
    dispatch({
      type: CREATE_ORDER_FROM_FORWARDED_MESSAGE_FAILURE,
      payload: error.message || '–ù–µ —É–¥–∞–ª–æ—Å—å —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –∑–∞—è–≤–∫—É –∏–∑ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è'
    })
    throw error
  }
}
```

### 5. –ü–†–û–í–ï–†–ö–ê –†–ê–ë–û–¢–û–°–ü–û–°–û–ë–ù–û–°–¢–ò (–û–ë–ù–û–í–õ–ï–ù–û)

   - –£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã–π –±–æ—Ç

   - –û—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤—å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä–æ–º –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ (#2024-110)
   - –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—å, —á—Ç–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—è–∑–∞–ª–æ—Å—å –∫ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–µ

2. **WhatsApp**:

   - –û—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤—å —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ Sandbox

   - –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—å, —á—Ç–æ –ø–æ–ª—è –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏ –∑–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏–ª–∏—Å—å –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏

**–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç**:

   - –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—å, —á—Ç–æ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –≤ —à–∞–ø–∫–µ

   - –û—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∏ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–µ—Ç –∏ –ø–æ–ø—Ä–æ–±—É–π –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å

### 6. –î–û–ü–û–õ–ù–ò–¢–ï–õ–¨–ù–´–ï –£–ö–ê–ó–ê–ù–ò–Ø (–û–ë–ù–û–í–õ–ï–ù–û)

   - –ü—Ä–∏ –æ—à–∏–±–∫–µ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–∏–µ –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ

## üö® –í–ê–ñ–ù–û–ï –ü–†–ï–î–£–ü–†–ï–ñ–î–ï–ù–ò–ï –î–õ–Ø CODEx AI

1. **–û—Å–æ–±–æ–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ —É–¥–µ–ª–∏ —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª—É "–°–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è"**:

   - –£–±–µ–¥–∏—Å—å, —á—Ç–æ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –ø—Ä–æ—á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ
   - –†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–π –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å–∞ WeChat –¥–ª—è –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–æ–≤
   - –£–±–µ–¥–∏—Å—å, —á—Ç–æ —Ñ–æ—Ç–æ–≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∏ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –∫–∞–∫ –ø—Ä–µ–≤—å—é
   - –†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–π –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–æ–∫ –∏–∑ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π

   - –†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–π –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤
   - –†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑—É–π —Ä–µ–∑–µ—Ä–≤–Ω—ã–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö

## ‚úÖ –ö–†–ò–¢–ï–†–ò–ò –£–°–ü–ï–•–ê (–û–ë–ù–û–í–õ–ï–ù–û)

CODEx AI –∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–∏—Ç –∑–∞–¥–∞—á—É —É—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω–æ, –µ—Å–ª–∏:

1. **–ò–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏**:
   - –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–µ—Ç –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è –ø–æ ID/–Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä—É
   - –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—è–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∞–º –ø—Ä–∏ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä–∞
   - –ö–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è

   - –ï—Å—Ç—å –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Ä—É—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
   - –û—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
   - –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç —Ä–µ–∑–µ—Ä–≤–Ω–∞—è —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –ø—Ä–∏ –æ—à–∏–±–∫–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫–∞

3. **–û–±—â–∞—è —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å**:
   - –í—Å–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω—ã –≤ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–∞–ø–∫–∞—Ö
   - –ë–∞–∑–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∞ –∏ –∑–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∞ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏
   - –ë—ç–∫–µ–Ω–¥ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –±–µ–∑ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ –∏ –≤–æ–∑–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–µ—Ç –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ
   - –§—Ä–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω–¥ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –±–µ–∑ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ –∏ –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ—Ç –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä—Ñ–µ–π—Å
   - –í—Å–µ —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—é—Ç –∫–∞–∫ –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è
   - –ù–µ—Ç –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ –ø—Ä–∏ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–∏ —Ñ—Ä–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω–¥–∞ –∏ –±—ç–∫–µ–Ω–¥–∞

4. **–¢–µ—Å—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ**:
   - –ü—Ä–æ–π–¥–µ–Ω—ã –≤—Å–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∏ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–æ—Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏
   - –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–º –º–µ—Å—Å–µ–Ω–¥–∂–µ—Ä–æ–º
   - –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–∞ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
   - –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–∞ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç –≤ —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏

### 1. –¢–ê–ë–õ–ò–¶–ê Currencies

**–¶–µ–ª—å**: –•—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –æ –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç–∞—Ö, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º—ã—Ö –≤ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–µ

**–ü–æ–ª—è**:
- id: INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT
- code: TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE (CNY, RUB, USD)
- name: TEXT NOT NULL (–ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–µ –Ω–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç—ã)
- symbol: TEXT NOT NULL (—Å–∏–º–≤–æ–ª –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç—ã: ¬•, ‚ÇΩ, $)
- is_purchase_base: BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 (–±–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—è –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç–∞ –∑–∞–∫—É–ø–æ–∫)
- is_reporting_base: BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 (–±–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—è –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç–∞ –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏)
- created_at: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

**SQL-–∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å –¥–ª—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è**:
```sql
CREATE TABLE Currencies (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    code TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
    is_purchase_base BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    is_reporting_base BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- –ó–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç—ã
INSERT INTO Currencies (code, name, symbol, is_purchase_base, is_reporting_base) VALUES
('CNY', '–ö–∏—Ç–∞–π—Å–∫–∏–π —é–∞–Ω—å', '¬•', 1, 0),
('RUB', '–†–æ—Å—Å–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π —Ä—É–±–ª—å', '‚ÇΩ', 0, 1),
('USD', '–î–æ–ª–ª–∞—Ä –°–®–ê', '$', 0, 0);
```

### 2. –¢–ê–ë–õ–ò–¶–ê CurrencyRates

**–¶–µ–ª—å**: –•—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–∏—Ö –∫—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤ –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç

**–ü–æ–ª—è**:
- id: INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT
- base_currency_id: INTEGER NOT NULL (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–æ–≤—É—é –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç—É)
- target_currency_id: INTEGER NOT NULL (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ —Ü–µ–ª–µ–≤—É—é –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç—É)
- rate: REAL NOT NULL (–∫—É—Ä—Å –æ–±–º–µ–Ω–∞)
- updated_at: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP (–≤—Ä–µ–º—è –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≥–æ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è)
- source: TEXT NOT NULL (–∏—Å—Ç–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö)
- UNIQUE(base_currency_id, target_currency_id) (—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–∞—Ä—ã –≤–∞–ª—é—Ç)

**SQL-–∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å –¥–ª—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è**:
```sql
CREATE TABLE CurrencyRates (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    base_currency_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    target_currency_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    rate REAL NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    source TEXT NOT NULL,
    UNIQUE(base_currency_id, target_currency_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(base_currency_id) REFERENCES Currencies(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(target_currency_id) REFERENCES Currencies(id)
);

-- –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—ã –¥–ª—è —É—Å–∫–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è
CREATE INDEX idx_currency_rates_base ON CurrencyRates(base_currency_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_currency_rates_target ON CurrencyRates(target_currency_id);

-- –ó–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º –±–∞–∑–æ–≤—ã–µ –∫—É—Ä—Å—ã
INSERT INTO CurrencyRates (base_currency_id, target_currency_id, rate, source)
SELECT 
    c1.id, c2.id, 
    CASE 
        WHEN c1.code = 'CNY' AND c2.code = 'RUB' THEN 12.60
        WHEN c1.code = 'CNY' AND c2.code = 'USD' THEN 0.14
        WHEN c1.code = 'USD' AND c2.code = 'RUB' THEN 92.50
        ELSE 1.0 
    END,
    '–¶–ë –†–§'
FROM Currencies c1, Currencies c2
WHERE 
    (c1.code = 'CNY' AND c2.code IN ('RUB', 'USD')) OR
    (c1.code = 'USD' AND c2.code = 'RUB');

-- –¢—Ä–∏–≥–≥–µ—Ä –¥–ª—è –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –∫—É—Ä—Å–∞
CREATE TRIGGER update_currency_rate_timestamp
AFTER UPDATE ON CurrencyRates
FOR EACH ROW
WHEN OLD.rate != NEW.rate
BEGIN
    UPDATE CurrencyRates SET updated_at = datetime('now') WHERE id = NEW.id;
END;
```

### 5. –¢–ê–ë–õ–ò–¶–ê Orders

- id: TEXT PRIMARY KEY (—É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ—Ä –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏, —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç: –ì–ì–ì–ì-–ù–ù–ù)
- client_id: INTEGER NOT NULL (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞)
- supplier_id: INTEGER NOT NULL (—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤—â–∏–∫–∞)

- description: TEXT (–æ–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞—è–≤–∫–∏)
- status: TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(status IN ('–Ω–æ–≤–∞—è', '–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ', '–ø—Ä–∏–æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∞', '–∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–∞', '–æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∞'))
- created_date: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP (–¥–∞—Ç–∞ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è)
- expected_delivery: DATE (–æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ–º–∞—è –¥–∞—Ç–∞ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∏)
- notes: TEXT (–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—á–∞–Ω–∏—è)
- total_cny: REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 (—Å—É–º–º–∞ –≤ —é–∞–Ω—è—Ö)
- total_rub: REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 (—Å—É–º–º–∞ –≤ —Ä—É–±–ª—è—Ö)
- total_usd: REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 (—Å—É–º–º–∞ –≤ –¥–æ–ª–ª–∞—Ä–∞—Ö)

**SQL-–∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å –¥–ª—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è**:
```sql

    id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(status IN ('–Ω–æ–≤–∞—è', '–≤ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–µ', '–ø—Ä–∏–æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∞', '–∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–∞', '–æ—Ç–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∞')),
    created_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    expected_delivery DATE,
    notes TEXT,
    total_cny REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    total_rub REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    total_usd REAL NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    FOREIGN KEY(client_id) REFERENCES Clients(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(id)

```
